- Improved registration process

Minor bug fixes and improvements for iOS 10 users
Fixes an issue with videos not loading in some products.
During this release, users will see Security, Menu and Accessibility panel improvements.
Implementation of changes and bug fixes.

Bug fixes and Feature. The new release also gives users the ability to check the size of an eBook before downloading it onto their device. They will also be notified if there is not enough space to accommodate the download.
With this release we have made improvements to the user experience and ability to access help information at every point in the journey.
Implementation of changes and bug fixes.
